results.content: Great course that covers most of the big topics in javascript. I already had a novice understanding of javascript and wanted to take the course to relearn the basics. If I wasn't already familiar with javascript I would have struggled, so something to be aware of when suggesting that no previous js experience is necessary. Would change: more exercises between sections 8-10 (arrow function syntax and async), a lesson on ajax. Liked: Clear and concise  explanations, the prime number exercise and the throttling/debouncing lessons. Thank you!
results.content_html: Great course that covers most of the big topics in javascript. I already had a novice understanding of javascript and wanted to take the course to relearn the basics. If I wasn't already familiar with javascript I would have struggled, so something to be aware of when suggesting that no previous js experience is necessary. Would change: more exercises between sections 8-10 (arrow function syntax and async), a lesson on ajax. Liked: Clear and concise explanations, the prime number exercise and the throttling/debouncing lessons. Thank you!

results.content:
The lessons are very well paced and the instructor is clear, most of the explanations are good ones. My two points are: a few times, the video was a bit confusing, but nothing very strange (if you re-watch again it's okay, maybe I'm just a little unfamiliar with the topic); And the lack of exercises, which made me a little frustrated.
But I made only 61%, and overall (based on those 61%), it's a good pick for someone who knows a few about programming and wish to learn Javascript.
results.content_html:
The lessons are very well paced and the instructor is clear, most of the explanations are good ones. results.content: This is a really great course on modern JavaScript and everything is to the point so not even a single second is wasted on anything unnecessary. And it not only covers the basics but also covers functional and object oriented programming along with asynchronous JavaScript and caching and local storage API with easy to understand examples. Since this course explains concepts like scopes, async, destructuring, array & object methods, OOP and FP really well, one can comfortably dive into libraries like React, Vue, etc after finishing this course.
results.content_html: This is a really great course on modern JavaScript and everything is to the point so not even a single second is wasted on anything unnecessary. And it not only covers the basics but also covers functional and object oriented programming along with asynchronous JavaScript and caching and local storage API with easy to understand examples. Since this course explains concepts like scopes, async, destructuring, array & object methods, OOP and FP really well, one can comfortably dive into libraries like React, Vue, etc after finishing this course.
